name: Mountain House Breakfast Skillet
description: Wrap your own tortillas around this mix of hash browns, scrambled eggs, pork sausage, peppers and onions for a fast, hot breakfast.Serves 2.Contains egg, milk, wheat, and soy.Manufacturers may alter ingredients without notifying MEC. Nutritional information and/or ingredients listed here may differ from actual package. Information on the packaging reflects actual contents.Ingredients: Hash browns (potatoes, vegetable oil [contains one or more of the following: canola oil, cottonseed oil, palm oil, soybean oil, sunflower oil], salt, dehydrated potato, enriched bleached flour [wheat flour, niacin, iron, thiamin mononitrate, riboflavis, folic acid], potassium sorbate, natural flavouring, disodium dihydrogen pyrophosphate, dextrose). Precooked eggs (whole eggs, egg yolks, nonfat dry milk, modified corn starch, corn oil, salt, yeast extract, sunflower oil, smoke flavour, xanthan gum). Pork sausage ([pork, salt, spices, sugar], textured vegetable protein [soy flour, salt]). Red and green bell peppers, chopped onions.
